constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 20 (Tuesday, February 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SCHAKOWSKY:
H.R. 6551.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress shall have Power . . . To regulate Commerce
with foreign Nations, and among the several States, and with
the Indian Tribes.
[Page H331]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: To provide a private right of action for persons harmed by violations of the Franchise Rule of the Federal Trade Commission, and for other purposes.
